data.lyric:
[ti:i hope ur miserable until ur dead (Explicit)]
[ar:Nessa Barrett]
[al:i hope ur miserable until ur dead (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]i hope ur miserable until ur dead (Explicit) - Nessa Barrett
[00:04.11]Lyrics by：Madi Yanofsky/Tim Randolph/Samuel Mark Catalano/Evan Blair/Nessa Barrett
[00:09.13]I still hear your voice tryna rip my world to pieces
[00:16.13]
[00:17.35]But I'm not your toy you can break and leave there bleeding
[00:24.63]The damage is done moving on if I'm ready or not
[00:29.24]
[00:32.74]But you drag me through mud here I come now I'm petty as f**k
[00:37.45]
[00:39.12]I'm petty as f**k
[00:40.65]
[00:42.96]I hope you never fall in love again
[00:45.77]
[00:46.85]I hope you be yourself and lose your friends
[00:49.86]
[00:51.06]I hope they call you out for s**t you said
[00:53.87]
[00:55.11]I hope you're miserable until you're dead
[00:58.00]
[01:00.31]I hope you're miserable oh
[01:03.49]
[01:04.43]So f**king miserable oh
[01:07.63]
[01:08.59]I hope you're miserable
[01:10.46]
[01:11.89]I hope you're miserable until you're dead
[01:14.84]Been keeping your s**t to myself
[01:16.87]If I said it out loud you'd be burning in Hell
[01:19.24]And I can make everybody hate you almost as much as you hate yourself
[01:23.44]But I won't 'cause
[01:24.74]I won't
[01:25.62]I know
[01:26.45]I know
[01:27.08]One day it'll come around
[01:28.85]But f**k you for now
[01:30.65]
[01:32.49]I hope you never fall in love again
[01:35.21]
[01:36.44]I hope you be yourself and lose your friends
[01:38.88]Lose your friends
[01:39.74]
[01:40.62]I hope they call you out for s**t you said
[01:43.30]
[01:43.88]You said
[01:45.01]I hope you're miserable until you're dead
[01:47.64]
[01:49.60]The damage is done movin' on if I'm ready or not
[01:54.17]
[01:57.60]But you drag me through mud here I come now I'm petty as f**k
[02:02.28]
[02:04.14]I'm petty as f**k
[02:05.41]
[02:07.57]I hope you never fall in love again
[02:10.41]
[02:11.65]I hope you be yourself and lose your friends
[02:14.58]
[02:15.83]I hope they call you out for s**t you said
[02:18.33]
[02:19.25]You said
[02:19.99]I hope you're miserable until you're dead
[02:22.75]
[02:24.08]I hope you're haunted by all your regrets
[02:27.18]
[02:28.23]I hope they f**k you up inside your head
[02:31.20]
[02:32.29]You know I don't forgive and don't forget
[02:35.35]
[02:36.46]I hope you're miserable until you're dead
[02:39.40]
[02:40.65]I hope you never fall in love again
[02:43.42]
[02:44.79]I hope you be yourself and lose your friends
[02:47.78]
[02:48.88]I hope they call you out for s**t you said
[02:51.85]
[02:53.03]I hope you're miserable until you're dead
data.trans:
[ti:i hope ur miserable until ur dead (Explicit)]
[ar:Nessa Barrett]
[al:i hope ur miserable until ur dead (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯音乐享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:04.11]//
[00:09.13]我仍然能听见你的声音 叫嚣着要把我的世界撕成碎片
[00:16.13]
[00:17.35]但我不是你的玩具 不会任由你毁灭我 让我血流不止
[00:24.63]伤害已经落下 不管我是否准备好都要向前迈进
[00:29.24]
[00:32.74]但你将我拖入泥泞 我来跟你对峙了 现在我会斤斤计较
[00:37.45]
[00:39.12]我会斤斤计较
[00:40.65]
[00:42.96]我希望你永远不要再坠入爱河
[00:45.77]
[00:46.85]我希望你可以我行我素 众叛亲离
[00:49.86]
[00:51.06]我希望他们因为你说过的蠢话 找你出去教训你
[00:53.87]
[00:55.11]我希望你到死都过得不幸
[00:58.00]
[01:00.31]我希望你过得不幸
[01:03.49]
[01:04.43]过得糟糕透顶
[01:07.63]
[01:08.59]我希望你过得不幸
[01:10.46]
[01:11.89]我希望你到死都过得不幸
[01:14.84]我一直将你那些鸡毛蒜皮藏在心里
[01:16.87]如果我大声呐喊 你会葬身地狱之火
[01:19.24]我可以让所有人仇恨你 就如同你仇恨自己
[01:23.44]但我不会那样做 因为
[01:24.74]我不会
[01:25.62]我知道
[01:26.45]我知道
[01:27.08]总有一天你会得到报应
[01:28.85]但现在你就得吃点苦头
[01:30.65]
[01:32.49]我希望你永远不要再坠入爱河
[01:35.21]
[01:36.44]我希望你可以我行我素 众叛亲离
[01:38.88]众叛亲离
[01:39.74]
[01:40.62]我希望他们因为你说过的蠢话 找你出去教训你
[01:43.30]
[01:43.88]你说过的话
[01:45.01]我希望你到死都过得不幸
[01:47.64]
[01:49.60]伤害已经落下 不管我是否准备好都要向前迈进
[01:54.17]
[01:57.60]但你将我拖入泥泞 现在我会斤斤计较
[02:02.28]
[02:04.14]我会斤斤计较
[02:05.41]
[02:07.57]我希望你永远不要再坠入爱河
[02:10.41]
[02:11.65]我希望你可以我行我素 众叛亲离
[02:14.58]
[02:15.83]我希望他们因为你说过的蠢话 找你出去教训你
[02:18.33]
[02:19.25]你说过的话
[02:19.99]我希望你到死都过得不幸
[02:22.75]
[02:24.08]我希望你日日被悔恨困扰
[02:27.18]
[02:28.23]我希望它在你脑中狠狠折磨你
[02:31.20]
[02:32.29]你知道我不会原谅 不会忘记
[02:35.35]
[02:36.46]我希望你到死都过得不幸
[02:39.40]
[02:40.65]我希望你永远不要再坠入爱河
[02:43.42]
[02:44.79]我希望你可以我行我素 众叛亲离
[02:47.78]
[02:48.88]我希望他们因为你说过的蠢话 找你出去教训你
[02:51.85]
[02:53.03]我希望你到死都过得不幸
